Layer.name: downhill-casing
Layer.Datasource:
&datasource-settings;

Layer.name: text
downhill-text
Layer.Datasource:
&datasource-settings; planet_osm_line
(SELECT CASE WHEN n is not null and r is null THEN n WHEN n is null and r is not null THEN r WHEN r=n THEN n WHEN n is not null and r is not null THEN concat(r,' - ',n) END as "PISTENAME", * FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN "highway"!='' THEN "piste:ref" ELSE coalesce("piste:ref","ref") END as r, coalesce("piste:name",name) as n, * FROM planet_osm_line WHERE ( "piste:name"!='' or "name"!='' or "piste:ref"!='' or "ref"!='' ) and (ST_X(ST_centroid(way)) > -4000000 or ST_y(ST_centroid(way)) < 0) and "piste:type" LIKE '%downhill%' ) as refs ) as pistes
